message.body: What did u think of dawn
It was tough as I only 15 min.
Wasn't able to get behind the surface really.
No giant red flags. Seemed pleasant enough. But set blown away either.
It is difficult with so little time but noticed somewhat lack of marketing duty experience. Little analytics, no marketing calendar, little social media, no Linked in
Yes. I relayed a similar message to Paul. I'm not too worried about social media but maybe Jacqueline will provide balance those areas.
One gut feeling was that she didn't scream leader/manager to me. But again only 15 min.
She didn't really have any questions for me, which I thought was weak.
I would say you are very perceptive for 15 min
I agree with yours. My concerns in experience. Seems willing to do whatever, pokes around systems but not solid in marketing, management areas!
Emailed you a photo with a fun story behind it
